snippet.title: Announcing Project Astrid – a new AAA open-world survival game from Splash Damage, Sacriel & shroud
snippet.description:
Announcing #ProjectAstrid: a AAA open-world survival game, developed by Splash Damage in partnership with leading creators Sacriel and shroud. 

We sat down with Sacriel, shroud and Project Astrid's Creative Director Lance to find out what they had to say about this exciting next step for Splash Damage. 

Read more about #ProjectAstrid at: https://www.splashdamage.com/news/announcing-project-astrid/  

Sign up for updates at https://www.splashdamage.com/newsletter     

Follow Splash Damage on social media: 
https://twitter.com/splashdamage 
https://www.instagram.com/splash_damage/  
https://www.linkedin.com/company/splash-damage/ 
https://www.facebook.com/splashdamage  

Follow Sacriel on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/sacriel  

Follow shroud on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/shroud  

#SplashDamage #Sacriel #shroud #gaming #scifi #survivalgame #openworld #videogames
